scripts.prebuild: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$paths = @('dist\assets\css','dist\assets\js','dist\inc'); foreach ($p in $paths) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $p | Out-Null }"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.copy-assets: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path inc\* -Destination dist\inc" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path *.php -Destination dist\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path README.md -Destination dist\ -Force"
scripts.zip: cd dist && (if exist sweet-portofolio rmdir /s /q sweet-portofolio) && mkdir sweet-portofolio && xcopy /E /I /Y assets sweet-portofolio\assets >nul && xcopy /E /I /Y inc sweet-portofolio\inc >nul && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path *.php -Destination sweet-portofolio\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path README.md -Destination sweet-portofolio\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue '.\sweet-portofolio.zip'; Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::CreateFromDirectory('.\sweet-portofolio', '.\sweet-portofolio.zip')"
